overview: Video store owner, Chi chi LaRue, hires Steve Ross as a stockboy.  After various sex encounters with the rest of the staff, Steve yearns for a true love lover to come into his life.  A miracle occurs and a mannekin, muscle-hunk Damian, cums to life and Steve takes him home to live happily ever after.  This video is worth watching not only for it's vintage value and the hot sex between Eric Manchester, Joey Pirelli, Nick Cougar and Nick Harmon; but the awfull acting performance of a very young Chi chi LaRue.  Damian barely speaks English which I guess is fitting for a mannequin come to life.
title: Mannequin Man
